folder: South Ferry - Williamsburg Bridge - [New York Steam Company plant.], Manhattan, NY
text:
East River, shore and skyline, north from John Street to Pike Slip and showing the Brooklyn Bridge. The steam emanates from the funnel of the New York Steam Co. plant at the S.W. corner of Water and John Streets.

February 9, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.
title: East River - Shore and skyline of lower Manhattan - South Ferry - Williamsburg Bridge - [New York Steam Company plant.]

folder: John Street & Water Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
John Street, north side, west from and including Water, to and including Pearl Streets.

April 14, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.
